column4: does anyone have any experience with gdesklets under ubuntu hoary?
I just installed it thru apt
but when I try to open a .display-file, the gdesklets-shell just opens and stays empty
, and if you try to enable it from within gdesklets?
the only thing I can do from the shell is: use the menu to install a package, and click on the 2 buttons (but even then nothing happens)
the list above the buttons is empty also
rm -r (r means recursive) is the way. but it's dangerous so be careful :)
found it! it was an installation fault. After fully deleting the folder and reinstalling it's a go :-p
hte problem is that I'm trying to mount an fat32-partition, and I state in the options that it should be "rw" but I still can't write to it
take that line, change hda7 to your drive and change dennis to your login
what do fmask and dmask do? I'm trying to understan the beast :-)
they set the read/write permissions of the partition
